thread.title: What a great hotel - great location
thread.title_full: What a great hotel - great location - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ronni H
title: What a great hotel - great location
text: This beautiful hotel is just about across the street from Carnegie Hall and about two blocks from Central Park. It's also any easy walk to Times Square. Subway is right across the street. Rooms are comfortable -- lots of pillows! Restaurants all around and completely safe. I would stay there again on my next visit!
